#### Part A: Error Handling Patterns (1 hour) - ‚úÖ COMPLETE

- [x] **Created `docs/patterns/error_handling.md`** (320 lines) ‚úÖ
  - [x] Header: "Error Handling Patterns in Flock" ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Pattern 1: Specific Exception Types** ‚úÖ
    - [x] Explained when to use specific exceptions vs broad ‚úÖ
    - [x] Provided code examples from codebase (scheduler.py, orchestrator.py) ‚úÖ
    - [x] Showed logging best practices with context ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Pattern 2: Error Context** ‚úÖ
    - [x] Explained adding context to errors ‚úÖ
    - [x] Showed logger.exception() with extra context ‚úÖ
    - [x] Showed raising with `from e` for causation chains ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Pattern 3: Custom Exceptions** ‚úÖ
    - [x] When to create custom exception classes ‚úÖ
    - [x] How to structure exception hierarchies ‚úÖ
    - [x] Examples from Flock patterns ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Pattern 4: Component Error Hooks** ‚úÖ
    - [x] Agent component error handling ‚úÖ
    - [x] Orchestrator component error handling ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Anti-Patterns** ‚úÖ
    - [x] Silent failures (empty except blocks) ‚úÖ
    - [x] Catching Exception without re-raising ‚úÖ
    - [x] Losing error context ‚úÖ
    - [x] Bare except ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Testing Error Handling** ‚úÖ
    - [x] Using pytest.raises() ‚úÖ
    - [x] Verifying error messages ‚úÖ
    - [x] Testing exception context ‚úÖ
    - [x] Mocking for error testing ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Achieved: 320 lines** (target: ~200-300 lines) ‚úÖ

#### Part B: Async Patterns (1 hour) - ‚úÖ COMPLETE

- [x] **Created `docs/patterns/async_patterns.md`** (370 lines) ‚úÖ
  - [x] Header: "Async Patterns in Flock" ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Pattern 1: Sequential Operations** ‚úÖ
    - [x] When operations depend on each other ‚úÖ
    - [x] Code examples from agent.py (line 244) ‚úÖ
    - [x] Performance implications ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Pattern 2: Parallel Operations** ‚úÖ
    - [x] When operations are independent ‚úÖ
    - [x] Code examples: asyncio.gather(), TaskGroup ‚úÖ
    - [x] Error handling in parallel operations ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Pattern 3: Fire-and-Forget** ‚úÖ
    - [x] Background tasks with asyncio.create_task() ‚úÖ
    - [x] When NOT to await ‚úÖ
    - [x] Task lifecycle management ‚úÖ
    - [x] Cleanup in orchestrator shutdown ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Pattern 4: Async Context Managers** ‚úÖ
    - [x] Using async with for resources ‚úÖ
    - [x] Semaphore for concurrency control ‚úÖ
    - [x] Custom async context managers ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Pattern 5: Async Iteration** ‚úÖ
    - [x] Async generators (async for) ‚úÖ
    - [x] Use cases in Flock (component hooks) ‚úÖ
    - [x] Error handling in async iteration ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Pattern 6: Task Groups (Python 3.11+)** ‚úÖ
    - [x] Benefits over gather() ‚úÖ
    - [x] Automatic cancellation ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Anti-Patterns** ‚úÖ
    - [x] Blocking operations in async functions ‚úÖ
    - [x] Missing await keywords ‚úÖ
    - [x] Not handling task cancellation ‚úÖ
    - [x] Creating tasks without tracking ‚úÖ
    - [x] Deadlocks with locks ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Testing Async Code** ‚úÖ
    - [x] pytest.mark.asyncio ‚úÖ
    - [x] Testing concurrent operations ‚úÖ
    - [x] Mock async functions ‚úÖ
    - [x] Testing timeouts ‚úÖ
  - [x] **Achieved: 370 lines** (target: ~250-350 lines) ‚úÖ

#### Part B: Contribution Guidelines (1 hour)

- [ ] **Update `docs/contributing.md`**
  - [ ] Add header: "Contributing to Flock"
  - [ ] **Code Style**
    - [ ] Reference error handling patterns doc
    - [ ] Reference async patterns doc
    - [ ] Linting with ruff
    - [ ] Formatting standards
  - [ ] **Testing Requirements**
    - [ ] Test coverage expectations (maintain or improve)
    - [ ] Unit tests for all new modules
    - [ ] Integration tests for workflows
    - [ ] Using pytest fixtures
  - [ ] **Module Organization**
    - [ ] Where to put new utilities (utils/)
    - [ ] Where to put new components (components/)
    - [ ] When to create new modules
    - [ ] File size guidelines (<500 LOC preferred)
  - [ ] **Pull Request Process**
    - [ ] Branch naming conventions
    - [ ] Commit message format
    - [ ] PR description template
    - [ ] Review process
  - [ ] **Documentation Requirements**
    - [ ] Docstring standards (Google style)
    - [ ] Type hints required
    - [ ] Update relevant docs
    - [ ] Include examples
  - [ ] **Architecture Principles**

  ```bash
  # Linting
  ruff check src/ --statistics

  # Type checking
  mypy src/ --show-error-codes

  # Complexity analysis
  radon cc src/ -a -s --total-average

  # Maintainability index
  radon mi src/ -s | grep -E "^src/flock/[^/]+\.py"
  ```
  - [ ] No linting errors
  - [ ] No type errors
  - [ ] Improved complexity scores
  - [ ] All top-level modules A or B rated
